Rhode Island Forensic Economics & Business Valuation Expert

Court-qualified economic expert witness serving all Rhode Island courts and jurisdictions. Based in Smithfield, RI with immediate access to Providence, Warwick, Cranston, and all county courthouses.

Comprehensive economic analysis and expert testimony for law firms throughout Rhode Island. Our experts use proven methodology with understanding of Rhode Island's economic landscape.
